text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Hehe, I'm thinking about what I'll send mom and dad this time.

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Last time, I sent them a ticket to the final day of a show that reminded me of how they first met……

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: And before that, I think I sent some amazake that ended up tasting good when I tried copying mom's…….?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Ah, well. I'll just send whatever comes to mind, like I've always done!
